title: Comparative Analysis of University Learning Preparation Activities: Instructional Strategy Design for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate understanding of scientific concepts and foundational pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: A comparative study on science concept teaching methods using VR simulations for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can design four learning readiness activities (productive failure, preparatory learning, meaning-making, worked examples) and apply them to VR simulations
Learners can comparatively analyze the effectiveness of different instructional methods using quantitative measurement tools (e.g., process evaluation, outcome evaluation)
Learners can select optimal preparatory activities tailored to learner characteristics (major knowledge, problem-solving skills) in university-level science education
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
